text: Gumazir Pita ko Jon Godɨn gavgavimɨn amizir derazim, a 40plan azenibagh afira. Gumazamiziba uari bizir kabar gari da otivizɨ, kamaghɨn me Godɨn ziam fe. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazir dapaniba ivezir kuram aning danɨngasa pura nɨghnɨsi, me manmaghɨn aning damuam. Egha me atiatir mɨgɨrɨgɨaba ko mɨgɨrɨgɨar gavgavir maba uam aning gamigha aning amadazɨ aning zui.
